title: Plumbing Vocabulary
description: Dive into the specialized language of plumbers and pipe fitters with this fun terminology quiz.

questions.question: What is a 'P-trap' in plumbing?
options: A curved pipe section that holds water to prevent sewer gases from entering a building

questions.question: What does 'sweating a pipe' mean in plumbing?
options: Soldering copper pipes together using heat and solder
When a cold pipe forms condensation

questions.question: What is a 'flapper valve'?
options: The rubber seal in a toilet tank that controls water flow into the bowl
A valve used in swimming pools

questions.question: In plumbing, what is a 'closet auger'?
options: A device for measuring pipe angles
A storage tool for pipe fittings
A specialized snake designed to unclog toilets

questions.question: What is 'backflow' in plumbing?
options: The unwanted reverse flow of water or other substances into the clean water supply
The flow of water through a garden hose

questions.question: What does a 'ball cock' do?
options: Connects the toilet to the floor
Stops water from leaking at pipe joints
Controls the water fill level in a toilet tank using a floating ball mechanism

questions.question: What is a 'coupling' in plumbing?
options: A fitting used to connect two pipes of the same diameter

questions.question: What does 'flux' do in plumbing?
options: Cleans and prepares metal surfaces so solder will bond properly

questions.question: What is a 'vent stack'?
options: A vertical pipe that allows air into the drainage system to maintain proper pressure
A chimney for a water heater

questions.question: What is 'water hammer'?
options: A tool for driving pipe into the ground
A loud banging noise caused by a sudden change in water flow direction or velocity

questions.question: What is a 'shutoff valve' also commonly called?
What is a 'nipple' in plumbing?
options: A short piece of pipe with threads on both ends used to connect fittings

questions.question: What does 'ABS' stand for in plumbing pipe materials?
What is a 'cleanout' in plumbing?
options: An access point in a drain line that allows for clearing blockages

questions.question: What is 'PEX' piping?
options: A type of cast iron pipe
Cross-linked polyethylene flexible tubing used for water supply lines
